description: Specifies what fields to include in an EntityBundle

includeEntity.description: Include the Entity in the response.

includeAnnotations.description: Include Annotations associated with the Entity in the response.

includePermissions.description: Include permissions of the current user on the entity.

includeEntityPath.description: Include EntityHeaders for all Entities in this Entity's path

includeHasChildren.description: Include boolean indicating whether this Entity has children

includeAccessControlList.description: Include the AccessControlList for this Entity

includeFileHandles.description: Include all FileHandles associated with this Entity.

includeTableBundle.description: If the Entity is a TableEntity, include Table specific metadata.

includeRootWikiId.description: Include the id of the root Wiki associated with this Entity

includeBenefactorACL.description: Include the ACL of the Entity from which this Entity inherits its AccessControlList

includeDOIAssociation.description: Include DOIs associated with this Entity

includeFileName.description: If this Entity is a FileEntity, include its filename

includeThreadCount.description: Include the number of discussion threads that mention this Entity

includeRestrictionInformation.description: Include the RestrictionLevel of this Entity

includeActivity.description: Include the Activity of this Entity
